snippet: Analysts and consumer advocates questioned the terms of a deal that the Justice Department had reached with US Airways and American Airlines.
abstract: Analysts and consumer advocates question terms of merger deal that the Justice Department has reached with US Airways and American Airlines, asking just how much consumers will benefit.
lead_paragraph: Analysts and consumer advocates questioned the terms of a deal that the Justice Department had reached with US Airways and American Airlines.

headline.main: Concession in Airline Merger Is Criticized
headline.print_headline: Concession in Airline Merger Is Criticized
